call_title: Ergo PoW Dev Update Feb 16th 2025 |  Wallets, Stable Coin, SubBlocks, Bounties, Nodes, and more!

topics.title: Call Introduction and Ecosystem Overview
topics.summary: Welcome to dev update #130 with discussion of Ergo's resilient ecosystem during market downturns. Host highlights the 30-40 active projects on Ergo and emphasizes the platform's strong fundamentals and tooling capabilities compared to other chains dependent on large money inflows.

topics.title: Nautilus Wallet Development Updates
topics.summary: AnonBR from Team Nautilus reports significant wallet improvements including refactored components, 24-word mnemonic support, and UI fixes. The Chrome extension wallet is also working on a mobile version.

topics.title: Paideia DAO Platform Progress
topics.summary: Luivatra mentions being busy and looks forward to the new execute from VAR function for Paideia contracts. Host encourages users to try spinning up DAOs on the platform.

topics.title: ErgFi Dexy Development Status
topics.summary: Progress on Dexy Gold swap widget completion, Bank LP widget in progress, and ErgoPay integration work. Testing conducted with fake tokens by end of week.

topics.title: Core Protocol and Node Updates
topics.summary: Kushti releases client 5.0.25 with extra node indices and Sigma SDK 5.0.15 featuring Execute from VAR and BigInt functions. Version 6.0.0 RC2 supports activation on public testnet with voting completed.

topics.title: Sub-blocks Implementation and Testing
topics.summary: First sub-blocks tests with AI implementation to improve transaction confirmation times. Development focuses on handling out-of-order sub-blocks, delayed transactions, and fork resolution while maintaining node consensus.

topics.title: Oracle V2 and Reward Tokens
topics.summary: SigmaUSD Oracle group vote passed for client version 2 update. Introduction of DORT (Dollar Oracle Reward Token) for SigmaUSD alongside existing GORT for Dexy Gold, with potential for additional oracle reward tokens.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Development Progress
topics.summary: Binance integration planned for release in coming days. Watcher version 2 adds observation status service, startup/stop functions, and DB service dependencies. RosenSoon app implements aggregation method for public event status.

topics.title: NodeView Interface Enhancements
topics.summary: NodeView XYZ adds special detection for major Ergo protocols including Spectrum DEX, Rosen Bridge, and SigmaUSD. Performance optimizations through caching and migration to Cloudflare hosting with planned pop-ups for swap parameters.

topics.title: Development Bounties and Opportunities
topics.summary: Active bounties include Keystone Wallet Integration (3,000 ERG) and Fleet SDK tutorials (775 SigmaUSD). Host strongly encourages developers to participate, emphasizing the learning opportunity and financial rewards available.

topics.title: RocksDB Node Client Release
topics.summary: Ergo Protocol Reference Client 5.1.2 released with RocksDB for improved database stability. Discussion of node maintenance challenges and database corruption issues, particularly on resource-constrained devices like Raspberry Pi.

topics.title: Oracle Update Completion
topics.summary: Oracle operators successfully completed the update ceremony in about 20 minutes. The minimal script update now allows for Oracle version 2 upgrades.

topics.title: Ecosystem Project Highlights
topics.summary: Updates on Cyberverse game nights and multiplayer games, MewFinance supporting Sigmanauts mining DAO liquidity, and mining pool community growth. Encouragement for small miners to join regardless of hardware capabilities.

topics.title: Call Wrap-up and Community Events
topics.summary: Host seeks feedback on new call format and promotes upcoming Thursday AMA and Sunday Sigmanauts meeting. Invitation extended for community members to join and listen to public discussions.
